# function: service_identifier

Normalizes the provided server name into the identifier expected by the BunkerWeb API.



## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
service_identifier(server_name string) string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `server_name` (String) Fully qualified domain name used when creating the service in BunkerWeb.
